channel.title: Wolf Scaper 317 EOS [Updated 5/10/10]
channel.description:
[center][b]Well, for the past few months I have been working on a new server. Using Devo 2.4
Server Banner:[/b]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/oh4rk6.gif[/img]
[center][b][u][size=24pt]Media[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[b] Wilderness Advertisement(Footage From The Original Server 2 years ago and From Now!)[April 2]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/2tDsMWgj9-I[/flash]
The OFFICIAL Trailer Of The V3 Client(Made By Legit PKERS and Desolated PKERS)[March 29]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/ncxhi-lfsnQ[/flash]
Melee Random Events(Does not include the non-combat random events)[March 26]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/kMtxAUHpxNc[/flash]
Genie Random Event and Lamp Using[March 28]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/nyEA08A-KbQ[/flash]
Armadyl Godwars:(Made By LEGIT PKERS (SOLOING))[March 23]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/y4k3dtwsUyA[/flash]
Bandos Godwars:(A player made a video of his clan going to godwars check it out)[March 20]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/1QxhMbbhrOA[/flash]
I currently finished a new minigame, check it out[January 5th]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/VIF8O1kGQnA[/flash]
Full Dagannoth Kings[December 6]:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/wxOJM-TDVLY[/flash]
Custom Tutorial Island[November 18]:
[img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/9465/homecj.png[/img]
When you log in you start here and talk to the survival guide, he will tell you how to start and how to make money then give you food and a teleport tablet and teleblock you for 5 minutes. This Stops noob X-loggers.
When you get Un-Tele-Blocked you teleport to lumbridge with the tele tab, then you talk to the master chef and get your starter.
Fixed NPC-Clipping using an XML Document:
[flash=200,200]http://img69.imageshack.us/i/movie0006.mp4/[/flash]
Multi-Attacks:
[flash=200,200]http://img694.imageshack.us/i/movie0007.mp4/[/flash]
I also have added:
Full Dharoks Fixed NPC Clipping Fixed Player Clipping when following Added better PVP following Added every special for weapons Added Perfect Timers on Ranged Added Full ranged bonus's Fixed prayer draining Added a few quests Added Full Barrows Started on Frame work(using sound frames and music frames)
Stable enough to hold around 800+ players
Anti-SYI Objects load from an XML file. Only added NPC's used. Lots of spawns Added Propper Teleports Created a good economy Added forums for buying items.
Finished adding music in 5 areas. Varrock, Falador, Lumbridge, Tzhaar, Barrows. You can also turn the music off.
Server is 100% perfect, server is still in progress due to adding lots of stuff
The longest we had the server online without turning it off to restart was 1 week.
SERVER WILL NEVER NULL!
Please post back saying if you support or not, and if you think this is a good project so far.
Updates From March:
~~God-Wars~~ Added God-wars(Kill Count, All Proper Animations for Monsters) All Boss's with proper hits(They hit through protection, you do need a team) Correct Projectiles and graphics(Commander uses blue shield, Kril uses ground thump, bandos uses pound, kree uses move)
~~Misc~~ Added New Items New Bonus's New Shops New Rewards New Drops New Spawns
~~Quests~~ Added New Quest(Nomads Requiem) Uses Lucien as "Nomad" Lucien hits like nomad does, if you have 99 hp he hits you a 98 with lightning Lucien summons minions(Those soulless beings from underground pass)
~~Wolf Wars~~ Added New Methods for Wolf-Wars(Added Monsters That drop "Ziffers") Added WW-Deposit(Use Ziffers on the deposit and lowers your enemy guardians defense level) Players Drop Zaffers when they die(use these on the WW-Deposit and raise your guardians defense level) New Objects(You can climb a variety of stairs for protection from melee)
~~New Spells~~ New Spell-book added(This book is called "The E") New spells train Attack, Strength, Defense, Ranged, Magic, Hit-points(Depending On What Spell You Choose) These are unlocked after every quest complete and 99 magic with 20,000,000 experience in magic. If you want to use Arrow Blast you must have 99 Ranged and Magic with 20,000,000 Experience in ranged and magic The above applies for all the spells if you want melee blast, 20M exp in Mage and The combat skill your blasting.
~~Monsters~~ Added a new defense system(allows the player to use defense draining spells on monsters)
~~Sounds And Music~~ All Sounds working correctly with a few exceptions(godswords specials and anchor special) All Music added into different cities, sometimes it doesn't work. Ability to mute sound and music or lower volume. Sounds Currently Disabled Until Bugs Are Fixed.
~~Clan Chat~~ 10 Ranks To Clan Chat (Floater, member, friend, captain, general, pack leader, pack captain, pack general, ,owner, alpha wolf) Change clan name at any time(allows wars and events)
~~Minigames~~ Added A starting base for Battle Dungeon (An old minigame from Wolf Scaper 317)
~~Client Sided~~ New censor New Crowns New Interfaces New Graphics New Items New Monsters New Objects
~~Skillcapes~~
Added 5 Skillcapes with working emotes(Strength, Ranged, Magic, Prayer, Attack) Started on(Defense, Hit-points, Runecrafting, Slayer, Fishing, Mining, Smithing)
[center][b]March 10-16[/center]
[center] [ul][li]Updated login packets[/li] [li]Removed over 3,000 lines of useless code in client.java[/li] [li]Added a new handler for custom object spawning[/li] [li]Re-worked the saving packets(there is no way you can null and no possible roll-backs)[/li][/ul] [/center][/b]
[b]New Updates:
We currently updated the client, so now we can say we are a 317 server :) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/5bomq.png[/img]
We also removed over 3,000 lines of code from the client, this now allows people to lag less due to non-needed processes...
3/20/10
-Added All Random Events(Tree Spirit, River Troll, Lost And Found, Genie, Maze)
Tree Spirit:
-Only Happens when woodcutting. -If you run It Follows You. -The only person allowed to attack it is the person who gets the random. -Only disappears if you log out or kill it(logging out increases chances of it coming back, killing decreases the chances).
River Troll:
-Only Happens When Fishing. -Uses Melee. -The person who got the random can only attack it. -Only disappears if you log out or kill it(logging out increases chances of it coming back, killing decreases the chances).
Rock Golem:
-Only Happens When Mining. -Uses Ranged and Melee. -The person who got the random can only attack it. -Only disappears if you log out or kill it(logging out increases chances of it coming back, killing decreases the chances).
Genie:
-Happens when doing whatever, cannot happen when another random is happening to you. -Gives you a lamp that gives you 1000 * the skill level you choose. -If you did not get the random and you talk to it it says "Fuck off noob."(might change).
Maze:
-Happens when doing whatever cannot happen while doing another random. -Gives you random items(no % left of reward added yet). -Cannot teleport away.
Evil Chicken: -Happens Whenever. -Uses Magic. -The person who got the random can only attack it. -Only disappears if you log out or kill it(logging out increases chances of it coming back, killing decreases the chances).
Video Of Melee Randoms:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/kMtxAUHpxNc[/flash]
Video Of Genie:
[flash=200,200]http://www.youtube.com/v/nyEA08A-KbQ[/flash]
5/4/10 Updates:
~Added a new WorldMap.XML File. ~Finished dumping 562 Emotes and GFX ~Added New Curse Prayers ~Removed All Customs ~Dumped 562 Items Into Client ~Created Object Handlers For Towns ~Removed All Old Quests ~Started New Quest Base ~Finished Quest Base ~Added Desert Treasure ~Added Shield Of Arrav ~Added Shilo Village ~Added Swan Song ~Added Lost City ~Added Dragon Slayer ~Added Monkey Madness ~Added The Knights Sword ~Added Legends Quest ~Added Heroes Quest ~Added Demon Slayer ~Added Nomads Requiem ~Added MiniQuests ~Re-Made Fight Caves(63 Waves/Team Waves) ~Added Castle Wars
5/5/10 Updates:
~Added New Maps ~Added New Minigame Folder ~Added New Skill Timers ~Finished Adding Unlockable Music ~Finished Adding Music Fade In/Out ~Finished Randomize On Music ~Finished Manual On Music ~Finished Adding Town Musics ~Added New Barrows Handler ~Added New Barrage Ice Block and Orb(first cast is an ice block, if player is frozen it's the orb) ~Added Clipping In GWD ~Added Clipping In Soul Wars(Moved Wolf Wars to a Soul Wars Map) ~Replaced Old Wolf Wars NPC'S With Gaurdian NPC'S
5/6/10~5/8/10 Updates:
None, Was Camping in the wilderness.(No, not on Runescape, the actual woods.)
5/9/10 Updates:
Started on a new clipping system Finished clipping system Added all skillcape Emotes Added Skillcape GFX Started adding New Interfaces Finished adding 474 Interfaces Removed 474 GameFrame Added 317 GameFrame Added All Spawns In All Areas
That's About It.
When I'm not busy doing homework or coding something new, I will make a few videos of the progress.[/b][/center]

item.title: Wolf Scaper 317 EOS [Updated 5/10/10]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:113, topic:321553”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=418000.msg3202616#msg3202616 date=1273458223]

I sent you a new World Map .XML File. This will allow you to stop clipping in GWD and newer areas.

Thanks, I packed a few new XML files into it, this allows Anti-Clipping Everywere

anti-clipping?

you basically just said no-clip…
[/quote]

Yes, thats what I mean, No-Clipping. See when I added the XML documents into the server, it disabled my ::NOCLIP command. I changed the XML documents and now the command works, but there is still clipping, NPC’S do not walk through objects.[/quote]

oh ok, my bad, i thought u were referring to trying to clip objects instead of making a noclip function.

Read full topic

item.title: Wolf Scaper 317 EOS [Updated 5/10/10]
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:112, topic:321553”][quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=418000.msg3202575#msg3202575 date=1273454102]

I sent you a new World Map .XML File. This will allow you to stop clipping in GWD and newer areas.

Thanks, I packed a few new XML files into it, this allows Anti-Clipping Everywere
[/quote]

anti-clipping?

you basically just said no-clip…[/quote]

Yes, thats what I mean, No-Clipping. See when I added the XML documents into the server, it disabled my ::NOCLIP command. I changed the XML documents and now the command works, but there is still clipping, NPC’S do not walk through objects.

Read full topic

item.title: Wolf Scaper 317 EOS [Updated 5/10/10]
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Chosen Pkz:

Nice, is this a Highly Edited Battlescape Server? Cuz you client icons are like battlescape client. Just wondering… goodjob

Right when you enter this section, it says, “DEVO 2.4”

The client is a refactored Galkons Client. Which at the time when Killamess released 2.4 was the only client compatible without work. So, no. Its Galkons Refactored client, and Devo 2.4.

Read full topic
